author: Special Correspondent
text:
Officials have intensified the vehicle checks across the district for ensuring free and fair poll.

S. Palanisamy, District Collector, inspected the process of checking vehicles At Sirkali, the revenue officials intercepted a car proceeding from Puducherry to Karaikal and seized Rs. 5 lakh cash. Balamurugan, Election Monitoring Officer, seized the cash which was being taken by Tirumurugan who was going to Tirumalairayapattinam.

An official release said that intensive patrolling had been taken up on the border of Karaikal and Nagapattinam districts.

PERAMBALUR: An additional 290 electronic voting machines have been received for use during the elections in the district. With this, the number of electronic voting machines has increased to 1,131, said an official release. R. Baby, Revenue Divisional Officer, received the additional EVM and supervised arrangements for safety custody.
title: Rs. 5 lakh seized in Nagapattinam district
